nodes.text: Jun was a hot rock planet with no moons that was located within the Parthovian Cluster's Faarlsun system, in the Wild Space region of the galaxy. The planet occupied the closest orbit to its star, the yellow-white Faarlsun.

Jun was first mentioned in the 1993 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game supplement Wanted by Cracken, which was written by Louis J. Prosperi for West End Games. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Faarlsun system, and therefore Jun, in grid square T-4.
